messages.subject: I NEED YOUR HELP
messages.body:
Dear Sir.
With due respect and humility, I write to you
irrespective of the fact that you don't know me.
I got your contact through your country's trade
journal
here in Cotonou Republic of Benin when I was making
inquiry
forforeign assistance
Can you care for me love me and take me as your blood
if so i will be happy in my life I got what you need

We are one
but they denied me naturally it may
interest you to know that I am Abdul Lawal Badjal a
university
student of calavi cotonou Rep of Benin calavi
I wonder why i was disown by the family of my
father that i was adopted by my father and the culture
did not allow me to stay in their family after the
news
was broken to me that my father involve in a motor
accident that claim his life and four others
From that very day i was rejected from the family
and i learn from my father that i was 16months old
when
my mother died
I went back to my school in Rep of Benin with the
little money l have with me two months later i receive
a message from my father's lawyer that my father have
$10.5m USD in a finance house here cotonou benin rep
here
which am the next of kin and he handed over all the
document to me
and advise me to keep away from the family and that i
should seek for
an international partiner who will assist me get this
money out of
this cotonou He make me to realise that throughly i
was adopted by
my father.
After l contact the finance house to confirm and
it is true and they are waiting fo me to come for the
collection
Please i will like you to come to my aid to help me
out of this problem for the collection of the
fund and to provide account for safe keeping of
the money for investment and to live africa and follow
you to live the rest of my live in your country
If you can help me i will give to you 15% of the
money and love you forever
Notice that you will sign agreement with me to avoid
future mis-understanding
Without hesitation upon the recieption of your reply i
will forward
your name as beneficiary to the Finance House ok
waiting your urgent reply

Thanks
REGARDS
Abdul Lawal Badjal
P/l Reply to the Email address below.
Email: abdbadjal1@yahoo.com
messages.raw:
Abdul Lawal Badjal

[ This has been prettied up - the Lads often type as if the screen is 25 characters wide. ]

Sent: Thursday, February 10, 2005
Subject: I NEED YOUR HELP

Dear Sir.
With due respect and humility, I write to you irrespective of the fact that you don't know me. I got your contact through your country's trade journal here in Cotonou Republic of Benin when I was making inquiry forforeign assistance
Can you care for me love me and take me as your blood if so i will be happy in my life I got what you need
We are one
but they denied me naturally it may interest you to know that I am Abdul Lawal Badjal a university student of calavi cotonou Rep of Benin calavi
I wonder why i was disown by the family of my father that i was adopted by my father and the culture did not allow me to stay in their family after the news was broken to me that my father involve in a motor accident that claim his life and four others From that very day i was rejected from the family and i learn from my father that i was 16months old when my mother died
I went back to my school in Rep of Benin with the little money l have with me two months later i receive a message from my father's lawyer that my father have $10.5m USD in a finance house here cotonou benin rep here
which am the next of kin and he handed over all the document to me and advise me to keep away from the family and that i should seek for an international partiner who will assist me get this money out of this cotonou He make me to realise that throughly i was adopted by my father.
After l contact the finance house to confirm and it is true and they are waiting fo me to come for the collection
Please i will like you to come to my aid to help me out of this problem for the collection of the fund and to provide account for safe keeping of the money for investment and to live africa and follow you to live the rest of my live in your country If you can help me i will give to you 15% of the money and love you forever
Notice that you will sign agreement with me to avoid future mis-understanding
Without hesitation upon the recieption of your reply i will forward your name as beneficiary to the Finance House ok waiting your urgent reply
Thanks
REGARDS
Abdul Lawal Badjal
P/l Reply to the Email address below.
Email: abdbadjal1@yahoo.com

messages.body:
Hello, son

I am still wiping tears from my face after reading
your heartbreaking story.  In my 76 years of life I
have never heard of such a tragic situation.

The reason I call you son is that I can barely write,
let alone pronounce, abdbadjal.  If you don't mind, I
will call you Luke, which is my estranged son's name. 
Your letter reminds me of his tragedy, perhaps I will
share it with you some day.

Please let me know how may I be of assistance.  We are
here to help each other, and between your offer of 15%
of the money and your unconditional love, how can I
resist?

Sincerely,

Anakin
messages.raw:
Juan Perez as Anakin Skywalker

Sent: Friday, February 11, 2005

Hello, son

I am still wiping tears from my face after reading your heartbreaking story. In my 76 years of life I have never heard of such a tragic situation.

The reason I call you son is that I can barely write, let alone pronounce, abdbadjal. If you don't mind, I will call you Luke, which is my estranged son's name. Your letter reminds me of his tragedy, perhaps I will share it with you some day.

Please let me know how may I be of assistance. We are here to help each other, and between your offer of 15% of the money and your unconditional love, how can I resist?

Sincerely,

Anakin

messages.body:
Dear Daddy.
Thanks for your godly mind and for your good caring.
i will like you to know that i really need your help
because since the 
family have rejected me out and i am here dieing in
benin rep ,i can 
no long continue my study because no one to help me
out and the 
finance house want me to provide my father foreign
pertiner for the 
fund which i will like you to stand as my brother ,
father and 
everything to help me out in move the fund out of the
finance house .
I will shall give you the parcentage as i mention in
my proposal and 
for any expenses you will also have al least 5 %
again.
Sir, I need your help because as i am now, nothing
remain for me than 
to continue pray to God and i need your help.
I will like you to give me some of this information in
other to submit 
it to the finance house in other to sign and submit as
the beneficairy 
and my father foreign pertiner.
1- Yout full name.
2- Your full address, contact information such as
phone and fax 
number.

3- Any bank account that you will like the fund to be
transfer into.
Please sir,I will want you to know that those
information will allow 
the bank to contact you for the transfer of the said
fund immediately.
l need your help.
Thanks
Abdul
messages.raw:
Abdul Lawal Badjal

Date: Sat, 12 Feb 2005

Dear Daddy.
Thanks for your godly mind and for your good caring. i will like you to know that i really need your help because since the family have rejected me out and i am here dieing in benin rep ,i can no long continue my study because no one to help me out and the finance house want me to provide my father foreign pertiner for the fund which i will like you to stand as my brother , father and everything to help me out in move the fund out of the finance house . I will shall give you the parcentage as i mention in my proposal and for any expenses you will also have al least 5 % again.
Sir, I need your help because as i am now, nothing remain for me than to continue pray to God and i need your help. I will like you to give me some of this information in other to submit it to the finance house in other to sign and submit as the beneficairy and my father foreign pertiner.
1- Yout full name.
2- Your full address, contact information such as phone and fax number.
3- Any bank account that you will like the fund to be transfer into.
Please sir,I will want you to know that those information will allow the bank to contact you for the transfer of the said fund immediately.
l need your help.
Thanks
Abdul

messages.body:
Hello, Luke

I will do my best to take care of you.  I would not
want another of my sons dieing far far away.

However, you must remember: my son's name is Luke, and
I expect you to use the same name.  As I told you,
abdulbadjal is too complicated for me to remember.

Go ahead and give the bank my name and email address. 
As soon as they contact me I will make sure they are a
legitimate bank with your best interests in mind. 
There are dishonest bankers out there who might take
advantage of your lack of experience.

Yours,

Anakin Skywalker
messages.raw:
Juan Perez as Anakin Skywalker

[who now apparently wants to be called Anakin Skywalker]

Sent: Monday, February 14, 2005

Hello, Luke

I will do my best to take care of you. I would not want another of my sons dieing far far away.

However, you must remember: my son's name is Luke, and I expect you to use the same name. As I told you, abdulbadjal is too complicated for me to remember.

Go ahead and give the bank my name and email address. As soon as they contact me I will make sure they are a legitimate bank with your best interests in mind. There are dishonest bankers out there who might take advantage of your lack of experience.

Yours,

Anakin Skywalker

[the Anakin thing apparently is no problem for the Lad]

messages.subject: ATTENTION: Mr. ANAKIN SKYWALKER.
messages.body: CC: abdbadjal1@yahoo.com
messages.raw:
[ And here it comes - a mail from a "Bank" ! ]

Paul Rolland, The Banker

From: "Bank of Africa cotonou branches" [bankafri@accountant.com]
CC: abdbadjal1@yahoo.com
Date: Mon, 21 Feb 2005
Subject: ATTENTION: Mr. ANAKIN SKYWALKER.

messages.body:
Cc: abdbadjal1@yahoo.com


Dear Paul,

I received your message and its contents are duly
noted.

I am going to open a new international bank account
for the specific purposes of this transaction. 
According to the bank officers, this account should be
fully operational in just a few days.

In the meantime, I will take advantage of your offer
to  provide me with the information I consider useful.
 Please send me the text of the article
COT/BJ/UNCXXII/15022(1993#01211/CAP.BJ/SWIFT CODE
AFRIBJBJ) by the system SWIFTNet FIX in credit format
Iso-15022 (600/800; A4), so I can familiarize myself
with its contents.   Unfortunately, I only have the
text of the old ISO 7775 data dictionary-based message
standard, which was replaced by ISO-15022 as you
probably know.  Since this one is actively supported
by ISSA, ISITC-IOA, G30), ECSDA, GSTPA, major ICSDs
and many domestic and cross-border securities
infrastructures, I firmly believe that is the way to
go.

Thanks in advance for your kind help.  I will contact
you as soon as I have the bank account number.

Regards,

Anakin Skywalker
messages.raw:
Juan Perez as Anakin Skywalker

Sent: Monday, February 21, 2005
To: Bank of Africa cotonou branches
Cc: abdbadjal1@yahoo.com

Dear Paul,

I received your message and its contents are duly noted.

I am going to open a new international bank account for the specific purposes of this transaction. According to the bank officers, this account should be fully operational in just a few days.

In the meantime, I will take advantage of your offer to provide me with the information I consider useful. Please send me the text of the article COT/BJ/UNCXXII/15022(1993#01211/CAP.BJ/SWIFT CODE AFRIBJBJ) by the system SWIFTNet FIX in credit format Iso-15022 (600/800; A4), so I can familiarize myself with its contents. Unfortunately, I only have the text of the old ISO 7775 data dictionary-based message standard, which was replaced by ISO-15022 as you probably know. Since this one is actively supported by ISSA, ISITC-IOA, G30), ECSDA, GSTPA, major ICSDs and many domestic and cross-border securities infrastructures, I firmly believe that is the way to go.

Thanks in advance for your kind help. I will contact you as soon as I have the bank account number.

Regards,

Anakin Skywalker

messages.subject: ATTENTION: Mr. ANAKIN SKYWALKER.
messages.body:
[bankafri@accountant.com}


ATTENTION: Mr. ANAKIN SKYWALKER.

Dear

We are here to confirm the received of your e-mail and
other necessary information you asked are the new ISO
in swift wire.

We are still waiting for your bank information in
order to allow us to verify from your bank.

It would be very important to inform you that before
announcing from the unit of mobilization of the funds,
the Head office of the fast ordering agent of AMERICAN
EXPRESS via the federal bank of reserves in the United
States NY 10007 New York, the fast activation of
credit and the placement of your funds in your bank
account as programmed on our pass-order SWIFTN et FIX
in format (600/800-A4) due to the code of transaction:
FIB/COT/PDR-XX/.............22/02/2005, 

The department of foreign financial remittance and
Director of BANK BENIN Of AFrica asks you to send to
our accredited bank attorney (the address and name is
given later ) the amount of 2,750.00 Euros (Charge for
reactivation of the ex-account) within 7(seven) bank
working days as from next Monday to allow us to
transfer your fund to your bank account in your
country.  
The fees will  allowing us to wire your funds to
destination within a time minimum(2)days, maximum (3)
days of banking operation  .
-Your personal fax number to publish you an official
receipt carrying the access pin code of recharge of
the funds in destination of your bank account for the
certification of currencies exportation as following
the transfer. 


BEST REGARDS

Mr , Paul Rolland   / Mobile line.00229-28 01 36

Remmittance department

 Copyright 2004  BANK OF AFRICA INCP. All rights
reserved.
messages.raw:
Paul Rolland, The Banker Guy

Subject: ATTENTION: Mr. ANAKIN SKYWALKER.

ATTENTION: Mr. ANAKIN SKYWALKER.

Dear

We are here to confirm the received of your e-mail and other necessary information you asked are the new ISO in swift wire.

We are still waiting for your bank information in order to allow us to verify from your bank.

It would be very important to inform you that before announcing from the unit of mobilization of the funds, the Head office of the fast ordering agent of AMERICAN EXPRESS via the federal bank of reserves in the United States NY 10007 New York, the fast activation of credit and the placement of your funds in your bank account as programmed on our pass-order SWIFTN et FIX in format (600/800-A4) due to the code of transaction: FIB/COT/PDR-XX/.............22/02/2005,

The department of foreign financial remittance and Director of BANK BENIN Of AFrica asks you to send to our accredited bank attorney (the address and name is given later ) the amount of 2,750.00 Euros (Charge for reactivation of the ex-account) within 7(seven) bank working days as from next Monday to allow us to transfer your fund to your bank account in your country.
The fees will allowing us to wire your funds to destination within a time minimum(2)days, maximum (3) days of banking operation .
-Your personal fax number to publish you an official receipt carrying the access pin code of recharge of the funds in destination of your bank account for the certification of currencies exportation as following the transfer.

BEST REGARDS

Mr , Paul Rolland / Mobile line.00229-28 01 36

Remmittance department

 Copyright 2004 BANK OF AFRICA INCP. All rights reserved.

messages.body:
Luke, this is your father.

I sense a disturbance in the force.  Take a look at
this email I received yesterday.  

You probably agree with me that this guy must be out
of his mind.  He is asking me to send money to some
"accredited bank attorney" I have never heard about. 
He even gives me a deadline of seven days, and does
not even have the proper name and address to send the
money!!!  

The worst part is, he has not even explained me the
proper modalities, let alone the perfected modalities
of this case!!!!  I am sorry, but he is not following
proper lad protocol, and will send no money until I
know exactly what is going on.

Let me know what do you think, you know I trust you
since you are my flesh, steel and blood.

Regards,

Anakin
messages.raw:
Juan Perez as Anakin Skywalker

Sent: Wednesday, February 23, 2005

Luke, this is your father.

I sense a disturbance in the force. Take a look at this email I received yesterday.

You probably agree with me that this guy must be out of his mind. He is asking me to send money to some "accredited bank attorney" I have never heard about. He even gives me a deadline of seven days, and does not even have the proper name and address to send the money!!!

The worst part is, he has not even explained me the proper modalities, let alone the perfected modalities of this case!!!! I am sorry, but he is not following proper lad protocol, and will send no money until I know exactly what is going on.

Let me know what do you think, you know I trust you since you are my flesh, steel and blood.

Regards,

Anakin

messages.subject: DADDY I NEED YOU
messages.body:
Dear Daddy.
Thanks for everything.

How are you over there? Hope your fine?
Daddy I want you to understand the banker did not want
to declare the 
modalities as i think because you know how banker are
doing, banker 
can never answer the question you asked daddy.
I want you to reply the bank and give him all the bank
information he 
asked .
As you can see that banker operations change day by
day due to the 
what going on in the world, i think that is the reason
why the banker 
did not want to expose their modelities.
daddy concerning the payment that banker have informed
me already when 
i went to the bank to submitted your informations and
he told me that 
we have to pay the fees to enable them to operate the
transfer through 
the old account , because Non residence account course
much money .
Sir, I belief the money he want us to pay is for the
account and some 
little bank fees which you know more than l do.
Daddy as you can see that they have told you that the
fund will move 
through US FUND mobilization and about the other bank
of american .
daddy i want you to reply the banker so it can give us
the name and 
where to send the money he asked off. Remember that
benin rep  is a 
small country and i need your help because non person
are caring for 
me here i am dieing due to liven and other thing like
feeding.
daddy please do try your possible best in helpinh me
out.
Thanks

Abdul

I want you to reply the bank and give him all the bank information he asked .
As you can see that banker operations change day by day due to the what going on in the world, i think that is the reason why the banker did not want to expose their modelities.
daddy concerning the payment that banker have informed me already when i went to the bank to submitted your informations and he told me that we have to pay the fees to enable them to operate the transfer through the old account , because Non residence account course much money .
Sir, I belief the money he want us to pay is for the account and some little bank fees which you know more than l do. Daddy as you can see that they have told you that the fund will move through US FUND mobilization and about the other bank of american .
daddy i want you to reply the banker so it can give us the name and where to send the money he asked off. Remember that benin rep is a small country and i need your help because non person are caring for me here i am dieing due to liven and other thing like feeding.
daddy please do try your possible best in helpinh me out.
Thanks
Abdul

messages.subject: Good news
messages.body:
Hello, Luke

I am glad to hear from you.  Do not forget who you are
or you won't get any response from your father.

I just came from the bank.  The manager assured me
that the new account will be ready this Wednesday.

Go back to the banker and tell him to explain me the
modalities of the case.  Let him know that I am not
going to send any money unless I know exactly what I
am doing, and that is final.  Also, I need a good
estimate of how much is this going to cost, so I can
plan my expenses in advance.  

Your father,

Anakin Skywalker
messages.raw:
Juan Perez as Anakin Skywalker

Sent: Monday, February 28, 2005
Subject: Good news

Hello, Luke

I am glad to hear from you. Do not forget who you are or you won't get any response from your father.

I just came from the bank. The manager assured me that the new account will be ready this Wednesday.

Go back to the banker and tell him to explain me the modalities of the case. Let him know that I am not going to send any money unless I know exactly what I am doing, and that is final. Also, I need a good estimate of how much is this going to cost, so I can plan my expenses in advance.

Your father,

Anakin Skywalker

Hello, Paul

I got my new Special International Account today, with
the authorization to receive and send funds overseas.

Please let me know the exact procedure for the
transfer, as well as a COMPLETE list of all the fees
and other expenses involved.  I need to have a family
meeting with my son Luke in order to proceed, and I
want to have all the information available to me.


Please respond as soon as possible, since time is of
the essence.

Regards,

Anakin Skywalker

messages.body:
Hello, son

I will send him my bank account information as soon as
he complies with my request.  So far he has kept me in
the dark, and that is not acceptable.

I am willing to help you, but I need to know how much
money is required.  I consider this an investment, and
expect to get my money's worth out out it.

Please contact this banker and have him hurry up.  I
will out of town next week, I have a family reunion on
Tatooine and I may be out of touch.

Regards,

Anakin Skywalker.

Please contact this banker and have him hurry up. I will out of town next week, I have a family reunion on Tatooine and I may be out of touch.

messages.subject: ANSWER MY QUESTION
messages.body:
Cc: abdbadjal1@yahoo.com

Hello Paul

I am afraid you are not answering my question.  I do
not want to know the fees to "launch the memorendum of
the transfer", whatever that means.  I need to know
the TOTAL amount of money I will need to have the fund
into my bank account, including all transfers, duties,
taxes, bribes, export fees, and other expenses.    

Please send me a DETAILED estimate of all the costs
mentioned.  I do not want any surprises.  

Additionally, I need a timetable for the transfer.  I
am tired of being kept in the dark.  My son and I will
not be treated like this.

Finally, stop sending me messages in .  
I get it, you know how to write HTML messages, but it
is very annoying and hard to read.  Please stick to
plain text.

Sincerely,

Anakin Skywalker
messages.raw:
Juan Perez as Anakin Skywalker

Sent: Tuesday, March 08, 2005
To: Bank of Africa cotonou branches
Cc: abdbadjal1@yahoo.com
Subject: ANSWER MY QUESTION

Hello Paul

I am afraid you are not answering my question. I do not want to know the fees to "launch the memorendum of the transfer", whatever that means. I need to know the TOTAL amount of money I will need to have the fund into my bank account, including all transfers, duties, taxes, bribes, export fees, and other expenses.

Please send me a DETAILED estimate of all the costs mentioned. I do not want any surprises.

Additionally, I need a timetable for the transfer. I am tired of being kept in the dark. My son and I will not be treated like this.

Finally, stop sending me messages in 36-point red font.
I get it, you know how to write HTML messages, but it is very annoying and hard to read. Please stick to plain text.

Sincerely,

Anakin Skywalker

messages.subject: Re: I NEED DETAILS
messages.body:
Hello, Luke

You are young and unexperienced, not to mention hardly
the sharpest tack in the box.  Please let me handle
this.  This banker is telling you half truths.  I am
asking him for the total cost of the transfer, not the
cost to start the transfer.  Please read this five or
six times and you will understand the difference.  


I have no problem getting a small sum such as 2750
Euros, but I am afraid that there may be other hidden
fees that will show later on.  Still, it is a
reasonable price to pay for the 10.5 millions, but I
need to know in advance.

Your father,

Anakin
messages.raw:
Juan Perez as Anakin Skywalker

Sent: Tuesday, March 08, 2005
To: Abdul badjal Lawal
Subject: Re: I NEED DETAILS

Hello, Luke

You are young and unexperienced, not to mention hardly the sharpest tack in the box. Please let me handle this. This banker is telling you half truths. I am asking him for the total cost of the transfer, not the cost to start the transfer. Please read this five or six times and you will understand the difference.

I have no problem getting a small sum such as 2750 Euros, but I am afraid that there may be other hidden fees that will show later on. Still, it is a reasonable price to pay for the 10.5 millions, but I need to know in advance.

Your father,

Anakin

messages.subject: RE:  Hello old friend
messages.body:
Hi, son.  I hope everything is going well.
 
I just sent the account details to the banker.  As I
told you, I need a few days to get the money he is
requesting.  Do you trust him?  I am under the
impression that that guy is a snake trying to scam us.
 
Do not worry about Yoda.  I believe his ancestors came
from Cotonou originally, but he has never been there. 
As a matter of fact, he has been living in his own
little world for the past few years.  I trust him
completely.  As a matter of fact, here is the email he
sent me last night:

 To: Anakin Skywalker
 
 Hmmm, money you want, eh?  Unexpected this is.
 Money.  I got money.  Interesting proposition you
make.
 Details you will send me.  Yes.


I will be out for a few days.  I need to inspect a
construction project that is falling behind schedule
and squeeze a few throats over there.  After that I
may take a quick trip to Alderaan, I've heard that
place blows.  I will do my best to keep in touch, but
don't worry if you don't hear from me right away. 
After all, we cannot do anything without Yoda's help.
 
Your father,
 
Anakin Skywalker
messages.raw:
Juan Perez as Anakin Skywalker

Sent: Friday, March 11, 2005
To: Abdul badjal Lawal

Hi, son. I hope everything is going well.

I just sent the account details to the banker. As I told you, I need a few days to get the money he is requesting. Do you trust him? I am under the impression that that guy is a snake trying to scam us.

Do not worry about Yoda. I believe his ancestors came from Cotonou originally, but he has never been there. As a matter of fact, he has been living in his own little world for the past few years. I trust him completely. As a matter of fact, here is the email he sent me last night:

From: Yoda [yoda@xxxx.com]
To: Anakin Skywalker
Subject: RE: Hello old friend

Hmmm, money you want, eh? Unexpected this is. Money. I got money. Interesting proposition you make.
Details you will send me. Yes.

I will be out for a few days. I need to inspect a construction project that is falling behind schedule and squeeze a few throats over there. After that I may take a quick trip to Alderaan, I've heard that place blows. I will do my best to keep in touch, but don't worry if you don't hear from me right away. After all, we cannot do anything without Yoda's help.

Your father,

Anakin Skywalker

messages.subject: I AM VERY, VERY DISAPPOINTED
messages.body:
Hello, son

I am deeply hurt by your email.  Is this how they
teach you proper respect for your father?  I don't
know what do you mean.  What scan are you talking
about?  Did someone scan my emails?  Please explain as
soon as you can.

Believe me, you could not have chosen a worst moment
to disrespect me.  As I told you, I was involved in an
accident during my vacations, and I may need to use a
respirator to allow me to breathe. 

This morning I got the transfer from Yoda's account
into mine, and I am ready to send the fees to the
banker. As soon as I receive your explanation and a
proper apology I will send the money.
 

Anakin Skywalker
messages.raw:
Juan Perez as Anakin Skywalker

Sent: Monday, March 28, 2005
To: Abdul badjal Lawal
Subject: I AM VERY, VERY DISAPPOINTED

Hello, son

I am deeply hurt by your email. Is this how they teach you proper respect for your father? I don't know what do you mean. What scan are you talking about? Did someone scan my emails? Please explain as soon as you can.

Believe me, you could not have chosen a worst moment to disrespect me. As I told you, I was involved in an accident during my vacations, and I may need to use a respirator to allow me to breathe.

This morning I got the transfer from Yoda's account into mine, and I am ready to send the fees to the banker. As soon as I receive your explanation and a proper apology I will send the money.

Anakin Skywalker

messages.body:
Hello, son

I am very disappointed for your lack of trust in your
father.
 Even worse, I still don't know what are you talking
about.  Please explain to me what is a "scan from
Africa".    Is someone scanning your continent or
something like that?  I have a scanner, but it is way
too small to scan Andorra, let alone Africa.

Please send me a clear explanation of what you mean by
these ridiculous accusations.  I cannot help a
disrespectful and ungrateful son like you.

I shared my thoughts with your uncle Yoda, and he
agreed with me.  He said "Careful you must be.  Such a
son you want not.  Scan of Africa? Hmmmpf"

The money he sent me will clear the bank this
afternoon.  I hope you can convince mne that you are
still worth helping.

Regards,

Anakin Skywalker.
messages.raw:
Juan Perez as Anakin Skywalker

Sent: Wednesday, March 30, 2005
To: Abdul badjal Lawal

Hello, son

I am very disappointed for your lack of trust in your father.
Even worse, I still don't know what are you talking about. Please explain to me what is a "scan from Africa". Is someone scanning your continent or something like that? I have a scanner, but it is way too small to scan Andorra, let alone Africa.

Please send me a clear explanation of what you mean by these ridiculous accusations. I cannot help a disrespectful and ungrateful son like you.

I shared my thoughts with your uncle Yoda, and he agreed with me. He said "Careful you must be. Such a son you want not. Scan of Africa? Hmmmpf"

The money he sent me will clear the bank this afternoon. I hope you can convince mne that you are still worth helping.

Regards,

Anakin Skywalker.
